Uses of Class
com.azure.core.amqp.RetryPolicy

  • Packages that use RetryPolicy 
    Package Description
    com.azure.core.amqp
    Package containing classes common to AMQP protocol.

    • Uses of RetryPolicy in com.azure.core.amqp

      Subclasses of RetryPolicy in com.azure.core.amqp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExponentialRetryPolicy
      A policy to govern retrying of messaging operations in which the delay between retries will grow in an exponential manner, allowing more time to recover as the number of retries increases.
      class  FixedRetryPolicy
      A policy to govern retrying of messaging operations in which the base delay between retries remains the same.
      Methods in com.azure.core.amqp that return RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryPolicy ExponentialRetryPolicy.clone()
      Creates a clone of this instance.
      RetryPolicy FixedRetryPolicy.clone()
      Creates a clone of this instance.
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.clone()
      Creates a clone of the retry policy.
      Methods in com.azure.core.amqp with parameters of type RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<AmqpLink> AmqpSession.createConsumer(String linkName, String entityPath, Duration timeout, RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Creates a new AMQP link that consumes events from the message broker.
      Mono<AmqpLink> AmqpSession.createProducer(String linkName, String entityPath, Duration timeout, RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Creates a new AMQP link that publishes events to the message broker.
